overview: Michael Graham has extensive experience in financial services, including the private equity and venture capital industries. From 1996 to 2003, he was Vice President of Working Ventures Canadian Fund Inc., a $600 million private equity and venture capital fund based in Toronto, where he was responsible for sourcing and structuring expansion, mezzanine and buyout investments in Canadian companies. He began his career in finance at the National Bank of Canada and HSBC Bank Canada structuring and managing senior debt facilities. Michael is also an experienced director having served on over fifteen Canadian private and public company boards.

relationships.title: Senior Managing Director and Country Head  - USA
